disqus.name: Disqus Integration
disqus.description: This application integrates the Disqus service into SobiPro and allows adding comments to SobiPro entries.
disqus.author: Sigsiu.NET GmbH
disqus.availability_expl: This application is available for SobiPro Club members only!

im_ex.name: Import/Export
im_ex.description: With the SobiPro Import/Export Application it is possible to import entries to a SobiPro section from a CSV File and to export entries from a SobiPro section to a CSV or XML file.
im_ex.author: Sigsiu.NET GmbH
im_ex.availability_expl: This application is available for SobiPro Silver and Gold Club members only!

jcomments.name: jComments Integration
jcomments.description: This application integrates JComments component into SobiPro and allows adding comments to SobiPro entries.
jcomments.author: Sigsiu.NET GmbH
jcomments.availability_expl: This application is available for SobiPro Club members only!

jupgrade.name: jUpgrade Adapter
jupgrade.description: Adapter for jUpgrade component to allow to migrate your SobiPro data from Joomla! 1.5 to Joomla! 2.5.
jupgrade.author: Sigsiu.NET GmbH

mod_sobipro_entries.name: SobiPro Entries Module
mod_sobipro_entries.description: Use this module to show entries of a SobiPro section. The sorting order for the entries can be set to different values, so you can use the module as a Most Popular Entries Module, Latest Entries Module, Last Updated Module, Module for Entries Expiring soon. Additionally the sorting order can be set to every text field (input box) of your directory, so you can use the module as a Sort Entries by Field Module.
mod_sobipro_entries.author: Sigsiu.NET GmbH
mod_sobipro_entries.availability_expl: This application is available for SobiPro Club members only!

mod_sobipro_geomap.name: SP-GeoMap Module
mod_sobipro_geomap.description: The SobiPro GeoMap Module allows you to show entries in a Joomla! module position from a specific SobiPro section on a Google Map.
mod_sobipro_geomap.author: Sigsiu.NET GmbH
mod_sobipro_geomap.availability_expl: This application is available for SobiPro Club members only!

notifications.name: Notifications
notifications.description: The Notifications application for SobiPro is the central email messenger for all emails send by SobiPro or a SobiPro app. It sends emails to users/authors and/or administrators on events like add, edit, publish, approve and payment. It also sends the emails for the Review & Rating App or the Contact Form Field (for Contact, Report or Claim Listings) if they are installed. The Notifications app let you manage all those sent emails. You can edit and resend them e.g. for payment reminder.
notifications.author: Sigsiu.NET GmbH
notifications.availability_expl: This application is available for SobiPro Club members only!

review_rating.name: Review and Rating
review_rating.description: The SobiPro Review and Rating Application allows you to extend your SobiPro directory to a fully featured Review site. It will allow you to set up Ratings for several different Criteria, as well as allow Visitors to list Likes and Dislikes along with the Review.
review_rating.author: Sigsiu.NET GmbH
review_rating.availability_expl: This application is available for Silver and Gold SobiPro Club members only!

router.name: Router
router.description: The SobiPro Router creates search engine friendly URLs for SobiPro to be used with Joomla! core SEF function.
router.author: Sigsiu.NET GmbH
router.availability_expl: This application is available for SobiPro Club members only!

aggregation_field.name: Aggregation Field
aggregation_field.description: The SobiPro Aggregation Field allows Users to add tags to an entry that will create a hyper-linked keyword in the front-end output that site visitors can click to view all related entries that have been tagged with the same keyword.
aggregation_field.author: Sigsiu.NET GmbH
aggregation_field.availability_expl: This application is available for SobiPro Club members only!

calendar_field.name: Calendar Field
calendar_field.description: The SobiPro Calendar Field lets you create a date field that features a popup calendar in the Entry Form that lets users easily select a date. In addition, there are sliders that allow you to choose a specific time as well. It is possible to make the calendar field become the Setting to Specify Entry Start Publishing Date or Specify Entry Stop Publishing Date.
calendar_field.author: Sigsiu.NET GmbH
calendar_field.availability_expl: This application is available for SobiPro Club members only!

contact_field.name: Contact Form Field
contact_field.description: The Contact Form Field is an application which adds any kind of contact form to an entry. With this field you can add e.g. a 'Contact Author', 'Claim Listing', 'Report Listing' or any other form to send an email, to the details view of the entries in your SobiPro directory.
contact_field.author: Sigsiu.NET GmbH
contact_field.availability_expl: This application is available for SobiPro Club members only!

download_field.name: Download Field
download_field.description: The Download Field extends the types of possible custom fields with a field type for downloads. With this field type you can upload (add entry) and download (details view) files for an entry.
download_field.author: Sigsiu.NET GmbH
download_field.availability_expl: This application is available for SobiPro Club members only!

geomap_field.name: SP-GeoMap Field
geomap_field.description: The Geo Map Field extends the types of possible custom fields with a field type for showing the location of an entry on a Google Map. The Add/Edit Entry form will be expanded by a map and the possibility to enter geographical coordinates. The details view or vcard of en entry will get a map with a marker for this entry. Following languages are available for this app and included in the package: English, German, Polish, Swedish
geomap_field.author: Sigsiu.NET GmbH
geomap_field.availability_expl: This application is available for SobiPro Club members only!

profile_field.name: Profile Field
profile_field.description: The SobiPro Profile Field has been created to allow Users to register on your Joomla! powered website during the process of adding an Entry to your SobiPro directory, or allow you to create a directory Section where User Profiles can be displayed with all the related entries of that Author from any or all of the SobiPro Sections on your site. The Profile Field also let you show a link and selected data within Entries that links back to the Author profile.
profile_field.author: Sigsiu.NET GmbH
profile_field.availability_expl: This application is available for SobiPro Club members only!

qrcode_field.name: QR-Code Field
qrcode_field.description: The SobiPro QR-Code Field shows a QR Code within a SobiPro entry.
qrcode_field.author: Sigsiu.NET GmbH
qrcode_field.availability_expl: This application is available for SobiPro Club members only!

rc5upd.name: SobiPro 1.0 Update from RC4 to RC5
rc5upd.description: Update package for SobiPro 1.0 RC4 to 1.0 RC5
rc5upd.author: Sigsiu.NET GmbH
rc5upd.availability_expl: This application is available for SobiPro Club members only!

stable108upd.name: SobiPro 1.0 Update from 1.0 stable to 1.0.8 stable
stable108upd.author: Sigsiu.NET GmbH
stable108upd.availability_expl: This application is available for SobiPro Club members only!

stableupd.name: SobiPro 1.0 Update from RC5 to stable
stableupd.description: Update package for SobiPro 1.0 RC5 to 1.0 stable.
stableupd.author: Sigsiu.NET GmbH
stableupd.availability_expl: This application is available for SobiPro Club members only!

sobimmo.name: SobImmo - Real Estate Template
sobimmo.description:
SobImmo is a SobiPro template which allows you easily create a professional Real Estate directory. It should give an idea what can be made with SobiPro. Feel free to adapt it to your needs.
The Installation Package creates a section Real Estate, three categories 'Apartment', 'Home' and 'Office' and all necessary fields and template files. You can just start with adding entries.
sobimmo.author: Sigsiu.NET GmbH
sobimmo.availability_expl: This application is available for SobiPro Club members only!

sobirestara.name: SobiRestara - Restaurants Guide Template
sobirestara.description:
SobiRestara is a SobiPro Template designed to be used as a Restaurants Guide. It should give an idea what can be made with SobiPro.

The Installation Package creates the section Restaurant Guide and all necessary Fields and Template files. You can just start with adding categories and entries.

Do not install the Template Package if you already have it installed. Updating a template package is not possible!
sobirestara.author: Sigsiu.NET GmbH
sobirestara.availability_expl: This application is available for SobiPro Club members only!

sobisort.name: SobiSort - Sortable Table Template
sobisort.description:
SobiSort is a SobiPro template which allows you to easily create a products directory which lists the items in a sortable table. It should give an idea what can be made with SobiPro. Feel free to adapt it to your needs.

The Installation Package creates a section Cell Phones, two categories Smartphones and Tablets and all necessary fields and template files.
You can just start with adding entries.
sobisort.author: Sigsiu.NET GmbH
sobisort.availability_expl: This application is available for SobiPro Club members only!
